mapper.insert: INSERT INTO upload_video (open, video_type, video_title, member_id, content, video_file_name, video_saved_name, thumbnail_file_name, thumbnail_saved_name) VALUES (#{open}, #{videoType}, #{videoTitle}, #{memberId}, #{content}, #{videoFileName}, #{videoSavedName}, #{thumbnailFileName}, #{thumbnailSavedName})
mapper.select: SELECT open open, video_no videoNo, video_type videoType, thumbnail_file_name thumbnailFileName, thumbnail_saved_name thumbnailSavedName, video_title videoTitle, upload_time uploadTime, update_time updateTime FROM upload_video ORDER BY video_no DESC

SELECT video_no videoNo, thumbnail_file_name thumbnailFileName, thumbnail_saved_name thumbnailSavedName, video_type videoType, video_title videoTitle, member_id memberId, content content, upload_time uploadTime FROM upload_video WHERE open <> '비공개' ORDER BY video_no DESC
